Name: Hyperglide
About the game: Hyperglide lets you experience thrilling wingsuit action in beautiful worlds. It features infinite procedural levels, so every time you play, you're presented with a new level to spice things up. To collect points, simply fly close to a wall, collect some gems, fly through waterfalls and birds flocks or try to find all five artifacts spread throughout the level. All this will stack in your trick-combo score and who knows, perhaps it will get you a spot in the global leaderboards. The closer and faster you fly to a wall, the more your points will multiply, so risky flying is rewarded but not required because after all, it's most important that you don't crash. Hyperglide supports controller, keyboard or mouse to steer. The controls are very easy to learn and it will only take you a few tries to get the hang of it. Additionally you can switch between third and first person view at any time. We are still working on more cool features for Hyperglide, so stay tuned and send us a message in Discord or the Steam Forums about ideas or bugs.
